## DomainStore.exposePii() method

Processes the specified value recursively by replacing any [PiiString](./paramodel.piistring.md) with the underlying decrypted or obfuscated value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exposePii<T>(this: void, value: T): Promise<ExposedPii<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | void | <i>(Ignored)</i> This function uses implicit <code>this</code> binding |
|  value | T | The value from which PII shall be exposed |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ExposedPii](./paramodel.exposedpii.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;
